dim.name: nLayerVolWeightedAvgFields
dim.description: A number equal to or greater than the number of var arrays in the layerVolumeWeightedAverageAM var structure below.

dim.name: nOceanRegionsTmp
dim.description: The number of regions defined within the global ocean (will eventually be moved up and used uniformly across MPAS-O.

nml_option.name: config_AM_layerVolumeWeightedAverage_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member layer-volume weighted is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_layerVolumeWeightedAverage_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_layerVolumeWeightedAverage_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_layerVolumeWeightedAverage_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member output write occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_layerVolumeWeightedAverage_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the string that should be tied to the layer volume weighted average analysis member

nml_option.name: config_AM_layerVolumeWeightedAverage_compute_predef_regions
nml_option.description: Computes predefined regions. (Does not require a region mask file.)

nml_option.name: config_AM_layerVolumeWeightedAverage_region_group
nml_option.description: The name of the region group, for which surface area weighted averages should be computed in addition to the global version.
nml_option.possible_values: 'all', '', or the name of a region group.

package.name: layerVolumeWeightedAverageAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the areal-averaging of 3D variables that are defined.

var.name: minLayerMaskValue
var.description: Minimum value of mask within region layer (should always be 1 for valid layers)

var.name: minLayerArea
var.description: Minimum area of cell within region layer

var.name: minLayerThickness
var.description: Minimum thickness within region layer

var.name: minLayerDensity
var.description: Minimum in-situ density within region layer

var.name: minLayerPotentialDensity
var.description: Minimum potential density within region layer

var.name: minLayerBruntVaisalaFreqTop
var.description: Minimum Brunt Vaisala frequency within region layer

var.name: minLayerVelocityZonal
var.description: Minimum zonal velocity within region layer

var.name: minLayerVelocityMeridional
var.description: Minimum meridional velocity within region layer

var.name: minLayerVertVelocityTop
var.description: Minimum vertical velocity within region layer

var.name: minLayerTemperature
var.description: Minimum surface temperature within region layer

var.name: minLayerSalinity
var.description: Minimum surface salinity within region layer

var.name: minLayerKineticEnergyCell
var.description: Minimum kinetic energy within region layer

var.name: minLayerRelativeVorticityCell
var.description: Minimum relative vorticity within region layer

var.name: minLayerDivergence
var.description: Minimum divergence within region layer

var.name: minLayerRelativeEnstrophyCell
var.description: Minimum relative enstrophy within region layer

var.name: minVolumeMaskValue
var.description: Minimum value of mask within region volume (should always be 1 for valid volumes)

var.name: minVolumeArea
var.description: Minimum area of cell within region volume
